name: Chapter 1
body:
#What do you know about Psychology?
Answer true or false.

____1. People usually fall in love with someone very different from themselves.

____2. Everyone dreams.

____3. Most people would be willing to administer a near-fatal electric shock to another person if an experimenter told them to do so.

____4. Homosexuality is classified as a mental disorder.

____5. Blind people have a more sensitive sense of hearing and touch.

____6. Animals process information in the same way that people do.

____7. A well-trained psychologist can determine a person's hidden problems by analyzing their dreams.

____8. Playing classical music (such as Mozart) for a young infant will increase his or her IQ.

[Answer](zhengzhixu.github.io/kss/chapter1tfanswer)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
